items.title: Employment Services
items.body: Our placement services work to bring developer job oppertunities to the community, can help you shine up that resume, or even prep for the big interview!

items.title: Mentor Program
items.body: Our mentor program pairs members with seasoned developers to help make sure you progress and achieve your goals.

items.title: Conference Scholorships
items.body: Operation Code partners with software development conferences around the world and offers scholorship tickets to events throughout the year.
